SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, review_id, p_id, u_id, review_u_id, review_satisfy, review_content, to_char(review_created,'YYYY-MM-DD') "review_created" FROM ( SELECT * FROM review ORDER BY review_id DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount} ) )
WHERE rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW(review_id, u_id, review_u_id, review_satisfy, review_content, review_created) values( NVL((select max (review_id)from review),0)+1, #{u_id}, #{review_u_id}, #{review_satisfy}, #{review_content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select review_id, u_id, review_u_id, p_id, review_satisfy, review_content, review_created from REVIEW where review_id=#{review_id}
